txt_en: A new heart for a New Year.
txt_cn: 新年新心情，旧貌换新颜。

txt_en: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly.
txt_cn: 只有通过内心，我们才能正确地看待一切。

txt_en: May the odds be ever in your favor.
Life offers up these moments of joy despite everything.
txt_cn: 尽管世事纷繁，生活仍会赐予我们欢乐时刻。

txt_en: Procrastination is the thief of time.
There is always something left to love.
txt_cn: 总有一些值得爱的东西。

txt_en: Take nothing on its looks; take everything on evidence.
txt_cn: 不要仅凭外观来判断；要基于证据来下结论。

txt_en: The quality of mercy is not strained.
What doesn't come from the heart can't bring about real change.
txt_cn: 发自内心的改变才能成真。

txt_en: Have the courage to do what you know is right.
txt_cn: 鼓起勇气去做你认为对的事。

txt_en: My life today is in no way a cold copy of my life yesterday.
txt_cn: 今日的生活绝不是昨天的简单重现。

txt_en: There is more day to dawn.
